title: Bugsplat in ranked, lost LP

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Just had a bugsplat that made me not connect for over 3 minutes. Team ended up remaking and I lost a considerable amount of LP and accused me of leaving. Please, can I get some help with this one? I've been trying to climb and this is an annoying setback.

replies.body: Bugsplats are typically a sign that some of the game files aren't working properly due to being corrupted or damaged. Let's try running a quick repair through the game client options and make sure you test it in a custom or practice game.
Alright, I repaired the game but what am I supposed to do about the lost lp?
